name: And I Know (Elva's Remix)
album_name: 日日夜夜…我最爱的顺子
lyric:
Do you know what it means to have a soul of your own?
Do you know how it feels to sing your own~song?
我常常一个人听音乐
让思念的心自由去飞
我承认自己 有点野
感觉对了 什么都Say Yeah~
And I know~And I know~
很多人都在猜我心里想谁
和你的眼神交会变得暧昧
我承认自己 并不完美
也渴望爱人的滋味 Ho~
And I know~And I know~
能不能暂时不管我是谁
用心去感觉属于我的一切
彼此都放弃所有防备
不管谁爱谁都无所谓
And I know~And I know~And I know~
So~Caught up~
And I know~And I know~And I know~
I~~~know I Know I Know I Know I Know I Know
And I know~And I know~And I know~
I~~~know I Know I Know I Know And I Know
